text: Bernard Chiarelli (24 February 1934 â€“ 17 November 2024) was a French footballer. He played as midfielder. He made one appearance for the France, against Switzerland in 1958. Chiarelli died on 17 November 2024, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Footballers from Nord
